alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Rains; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 11:53PM CDT until June 16 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Van Zandt County in north central Texas... Northeastern Henderson County in central Texas... Rains County in north central Texas... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1152 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Edgewood, or near Wills Point, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Gun Barrel City, Canton, Wills Point, Grand Saline, Chandler, Van, Malakoff, Edgewood, Emory, Brownsboro, Eustace, East Tawakoni, Point, Fruitvale, Edom, Caney City, Forest Grove Reservoir, Purtis Creek State Park and Lake Tawakoni. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 513 and 542. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning can kill.
